Single outlier selector

outlier_selector.Rd

A selector composed by two rows containing:

  • a label

  • two inline shiny::textInput boxes for the upper and lower limit of the outliers

Usage

outlier_ui(id, label, value_ll = "", value_ul = "")

outlier_server(id)

Arguments

id

Shiny ID [character(1)]

label

label for the selectors

value_ll

an initial value for the lower limit

value_ul

an initial value for the upper limit

Value

A reactive containing a list with two entriesll and ul. It returns either NA if the box is empty or the result of applying as.numeric to the contents of the input box. It does not return NULL values.

Details

The UI root element is a divisor which id attribute is equal to the id parameter. So it can be used with shiny::insertUI and shiny::removeUI functions.

Functions

  • outlier_ui(): UI

  • outlier_server(): server

See also

outlier_container
